overview: Mercedes is living the life that many women envy: she's gorgeous, married to a man who loves her, and she doesn't need to work anymore...but Mercedes is bored and lonely. After some flight attendants move in next door Mercedes finds herself fantasizing about a lesbian relationship. With the help of her best friend, she embarks on an odyssey of decadent lesbian sex, all while her husband is away on business. Is this the life that Mercedes really wants? To leave the security of a life she worked so hard to build? She finds the answer and much, much more.
title: Wifey
